channel.title: Agentmoose/deathwilldie using xray? :(
channel.description:
I was on the console checking plugin versions and such so I can upgrade things, and caught these private messages:
[code]21:03:23 [INFO] [PLAYER_COMMAND] deathwilldie: /msg agentmoose do you have your thing showing ender? 21:03:28 [INFO] [PLAYER_COMMAND] AgentMoose: /r yes 21:03:35 [INFO] [PLAYER_COMMAND] deathwilldie: /r I also have mine show chests 21:03:50 [INFO] [PLAYER_COMMAND] AgentMoose: /r do you use the hacked client? 21:03:55 [INFO] [PLAYER_COMMAND] deathwilldie: /r nopes 21:04:11 [INFO] [PLAYER_COMMAND] AgentMoose: /r it can show chests? 21:04:23 [INFO] [PLAYER_COMMAND] deathwilldie: /r just add chest <color> or whatever it is, just follow the rest [/code]
What are they talking about? :(

item.title: Agentmoose/deathwilldie using xray? :(
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

I cant see them X-raying for personal gain.
Combined they must be super rich. All Death does is dig huge caves.
They might be using it more for construction… But I’m an optimist.

Read full topic

item.title: Agentmoose/deathwilldie using xray? :(
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’d keep an eye on them, I’m more concerned about the fact they denied it when you directly asked them. It was pretty obvious they were xraying in some form, besides dwd has been suspected of xraying loads of times and even posted a picture by accident of him with an xray mod installed

All you’ve taught them is not to discuss it on the server so if they have at least half a brain cell don’t expect to catch them again

They better stop in time for the new chunks to be generated, because if I catch them xraying on the new chunks, they will become an example for everyone else.

Read full topic

item.title: Agentmoose/deathwilldie using xray? :(
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

A warning to me should suffice, just keep an eye on them I guess and if they don’t stop then ban them.

Read full topic

item.title: Agentmoose/deathwilldie using xray? :(
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Ok, after the server restart I caught them on alone so I confronted them:

21:44:12 [INFO] Connected players:AgentMoose, deathwilldie
>say so are you guys using xray now?
21:44:19 [INFO] [Server] so are you guys using xray now?
21:44:34 [INFO] [1]<AgentMoose> Huh?
21:44:38 [INFO] [1]<AgentMoose> No.
>say i saw a pm convo between you two earlier
21:44:45 [INFO] [Server] i saw a pm convo between you two earlier
>say looked very suspicous
21:44:58 [INFO] [Server] looked very suspicous
>say about showing chests etc
21:45:13 [INFO] [Server] about showing chests etc
21:45:27 [INFO] [1]<AgentMoose> Oh, that :P
21:45:37 [INFO] [1]<AgentMoose> I never said I used it xD
21:45:54 [INFO] [1]<deathwilldie> Oh yeahhhhhhh, I don't ever use that on this server :P
>say death did :)
21:45:58 [INFO] [Server] death did :)
21:46:03 [INFO] [1]<deathwilldie> I care too much about this server to be banned :P

so?

Read full topic

item.title: Agentmoose/deathwilldie using xray? :(
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

Well Tom would probably want to ban them out* right but I’d just ask them not to use cheats, but I’m still not quite following their conversation.

Read full topic

item.title: Agentmoose/deathwilldie using xray? :(
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

So what should be done?

I think Tabbykiller (summerwine) was a bad influence on them.
